name: accented
content:

Add to word list
influenced by the pronunciation used in a different language: heavily accented He spoke in heavily accented French. Her lightly accented English is almost perfect. See
accent
More examplesFewer examplesHe answered with a terse accented "Yes".She speaks with an accented and strangely phrased Spanish.Frank's heavily accented Mandarin reveals his home.
